block.p: WILNER-Abraham. Age 90. For nearly sixty-four years, beloved husband of Pauline. Loving brother of Edith (Morris) Dinnerstein, the late Martha and Lou Alexander, the late Henry Wilner, brother-in-law of Ruth Wilner. Loving father of Dr. Gerald (Maddy) Wilner and Barbara (Robert) Hammer. Devoted grandfather of Kenneth Wilner, Douglas (Beth) Wilner and Howard (Jen) Wilner; Jonathan (Michelle) Hammer-Kossoy and Michael Hammer (BatAmi Frankel); great-grandfather of Leora Hammer-Kossoy, Elena Wilner and Jacob Wilner. Loving uncle of nieces and nephews; friend and colleague to many. B.A and M.A., CCNY, Class of 1931, retired Assistant Superintendent, NYC Public Schools. Services Monday, September 25, 2000, at 2 PM, Sherman's Flatbush Memorial Chapel, 1283 Coney Island Ave., Brooklyn, NY 11230
WILNER-Abraham. My dearest love of my life, together for sixtythree and a half years and forever and forever. Sleep peacefully, Your Paulin
